cards.question: Traduza: 'I have been studying English for three years.'
cards.answer: Eu estudo inglês há três anos.

cards.question: Traduza: 'If I were you, I would go to the party.'
cards.answer: Se eu fosse você, eu iria à festa.

cards.question: Traduza: 'I look forward to hearing from you.'
cards.answer: Fico no aguardo de notícias suas.

cards.question: Traduza: 'Although it was raining, they went for a walk.'
cards.answer: Embora estivesse chovendo, eles foram caminhar.

cards.question: Traduza: 'I'm used to waking up early.'
cards.answer: Eu estou acostumado a acordar cedo.

cards.question: Traduza: 'Could you please tell me how to get to the station?'
cards.answer: Você poderia me dizer como chegar à estação, por favor?

cards.question: Complete: 'This is the most ____ book I've ever read.' (interessante)
Traduza: 'I wish I had more time to travel.'
cards.answer: Eu gostaria de ter mais tempo para viajar.

cards.question: Traduza: 'They have already finished their homework.'
cards.answer: Eles já terminaram o dever de casa.

cards.question: Complete: 'He is much ____ than his brother.' (mais alto)
Traduza: 'I don't mind waiting if you're busy.'
cards.answer: Eu não me importo de esperar se você estiver ocupado.

cards.question: Traduza: 'The weather is getting better and better.'
cards.answer: O tempo está ficando cada vez melhor.

cards.question: Complete: 'I'll call you as soon as I ____.' (chegar)
